Package com.bytedesk.ai.springai.providers.ragflow

Class RagflowChatService

java.lang.Object
com.bytedesk.ai.springai.providers.ragflow.RagflowChatService
@Service @ConditionalOnProperty(name="bytedesk.ragflow.enabled", havingValue="true", matchIfMissing=false) public class RagflowChatService extends Object
RAGFlow Chat Service - 基于 RAGFlow API 的对话服务 https://ragflow.io/docs/dev/http_api_reference
